titles.title: Craters of the Moon National Monument Boundary Revision Act of 1993
A bill to revise the boundaries of the Craters of the Moon National Monument, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

bill.summary: 9/21/1993--Introduced. Craters of the Moon National Monument Boundary Revision Act of 1993 - Revises the boundaries of Craters of the Moon National Monument, Idaho. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire specified land and interests in land within such revised boundaries. Authorizes appropriations.
